bio:
Tsrasuna, a Khajiit woman, is one of the Hunters of Hircine. Hircine is the Daedric Lord of the Hunt. Tsrasuna may be found inside Bloated Man's Grotto, which is located in the mountains at the northern edge of Falkreath Hold.
Tsrasuna has been sent by Lord Hircine to kill the werewolf Sinding, to send him to the Hunting Grounds. The Hunting Grounds is the afterlife destination associated with Hircine, and is where all werewolves and followers of Hircine are sent after their death. If the player expresses the intention to attack and kill Sinding, Tsrasuna will help the player, and be friendly with the player after Sinding is killed. If the player indicates that they intend to help Sinding, Tsrasuna will become hostile to the player.
name: Tsrasuna
